content: ​pick the new color ​yo pull through both loops on your hook ★ rc =​ rising chain 4 crochet pattern by chiara cremon @chiacrafts ​ https //www instagram com/chiacrafts https //www ravelry com/stores/chiara-cremon-designs note on the yarn materials for this project i ve used yarn for a 3 0 hook and ★ 2 0 mm hook as usual when working amigurumis i ve worked it ★ 3 0 mm hook with a hook 1 size smaller than indicated to better ★ tapestry needle work the body tight thus avoiding holes in the ★ 8mm black safety eyes crochet from which the stuffing would be visible ★ stuffing poly fiber fill or other or fall through ★ yarn all in the same size of the following you should get a good result with this pattern as long as you stick to one yarn brand/size work the colors ○ beige skin body with a hook 1 size smaller than indicated ○ orange dress and scale the rest of the hooks accordingly ○ dark brown hair still my advice is to avoid picking a yarn much ○ brown dress thicker than indicated to avoid a sloppy result ○ sand dress maximum 1 size bigger ○ pink flower ○ tiny scraps of white black light dimensions blue and red to work the details and embroideries using the yarn and hook size indicated and most importantly working tight the dimensions of the finished doll are 12x5cm note on the eyes the right safety eyes size depends on the doll s dimensions don t purchase 8mm eyes if you re not sure the dimensions of your doll will be similar to mine s my advice is to purchase a box with many different sizes and use the one which better suits your doll 5 crochet pattern by chiara cremon @chiacrafts ​ https //www instagram com/chiacrafts https //www ravelry com/stores/chiara-cremon-designs legs hook 2 0 work tight start with beige yarn r1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 r2-r13 6 single_crochet 6 make 2 legs the legs don t need stuffing cy-po after making the first leg leave a long tail in case some sewing should be needed don t cut the yarn after making the second leg r15 16 single_crochet 16 instead you ll keep on working from there to join now we re enlarging to create the booty the legs r16 2 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet x 2 8 single_crochet 18 r17 18 single_crochet 18 r18 18 single_crochet 18 r19 2 single_crochet decrease 2 single_crochet x 2 8 single_crochet 16 booty finished change to orange the color change should fall on the back r20 16
